attributes.action: Show our true appreciation of our heros. Give NHS workers a 25% payrise.
attributes.additional_details: Our NHS staff have proved to be absolutely critical in this crisis. They have worked in dangerous unforgiving conditions, often without proper protective equipment. many have even lost their lives. These people are true heros. Let's show our true appreciation and give NHS workers a 25% payrise
attributes.background: Our NHS staff have proved to be absolutely critical in this crisis. They have worked in dangerous unforgiving conditions, often without proper protective equipment. many have even lost their lives. These people are true heros. Let's show our true appreciation and give NHS workers a 25% payrise.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073
